name: Just VR Slingshot Target Practice
description: Spend some time shooting targets with a slingshot. This game is, after all, Just VR Slingshot Target Practice.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or better Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or better / AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive or Oculus Rift required
